news_header: The Netherlands will return over 100 Benin Bronzes looted by British troops in the 19th century.
news_original_title: Netherlands to return stolen Benin Bronzes to Nigeria
news_text: The Netherlands is set to return more than 100 Benin Bronzes, looted by British troops in the late 19th century, to Nigeria. This is the largest repatriation of Benin antiquities, highlighting the ongoing impact of colonialism. The return is seen as a step towards addressing historical injustices.
